title: Rural internet program on hold as Musk's satellites get new consideration
summary: Trump has paused the rollout of the $42 billion Broadband Equity Access and Deployment program to prioritize a “tech-neutral” approach, potentially favoring satellite providers like Elon Musk’s Starlink
description: Trump has paused the rollout of the $42 billion Broadband Equity Access and Deployment program to prioritize a “tech-neutral” approach, potentially favoring satellite providers like Elon Musk’s Starlink
